div.div: St. Norbert College vs. Lake Forest College
at Lake Forest, Ill. | Farwell Field

tr.td: Lake Forest wins coin toss and defers, will defend west end zone.
Jon Gurchak kickoff 60 yards to the SNC05, Brian Fliess return 18 yards to the SNC23 (M.GarettoBalmer).
Brad Boockmeier rush for 2 yards to the SNC25 (John Preston; Ramel Samuel).
Brad Boockmeier rush for 11 yards to the SNC36 (Pat Clark).
James Tringali pass complete to Brad Boockmeier for 2 yards to the SNC38, out-of-bounds (John Preston).
James Tringali pass complete to Mark Villers for 8 yards to the SNC46 (Nick Waters).
James Tringali pass incomplete to Mark Villers.
Brad Boockmeier rush for 2 yards to the SNC48 (John Preston).
James Tringali pass incomplete to Mark Villers (Nick Waters).
Kevin Krueger punt 38 yards to the LFC14, Joey Kropp return 5 yards to the LFC19 (Jacob Wells).

Alec Howe rush for 2 yards to the LFC21 (Zach Klarkowski; Brian Feltz).
Mike Lewis pass complete to Willie McIntyre for 3 yards to the LFC24, out-of-bounds (Anthony Parker).
Mike Lewis pass incomplete to Mike Peters (Anthony Parker).
